hero.title: Look and feel your absolute best
hero.subtitle: From precision cuts to stunning color transformations, our expert stylists create looks that enhance your natural beauty. Book your appointment and discover the Glow Studio difference.
hero.imageAlt: Modern salon interior with professional styling stations and elegant lighting

about.title: Our Story
about.body: Founded in 2015 by Master Stylist Sarah Chen, Glow Studio has become the premier destination for beauty and wellness in our community. Our team of certified professionals brings years of experience and the latest techniques to every service.
about.subtitle: Why choose Glow Studio

owner.name: Sarah Chen
owner.title: Master Stylist & Owner
owner.bio: Sarah brings 15+ years of experience from top salons in New York and Los Angeles. She specializes in color correction and bridal styling, and has been featured in multiple beauty magazines.

products.name: Precision Haircut
products.description: Expert cut tailored to your face shape and lifestyle. Includes wash, cut, and style.

products.name: Full Color Service
products.description: Complete color transformation with premium products. Includes consultation, color, and style.

products.name: Gel Manicure
products.description: Long-lasting gel polish that stays perfect for up to 3 weeks.

products.name: Spa Pedicure
products.description: Luxurious pedicure with exfoliation, massage, and polish. Perfect for relaxation.

products.name: Signature Facial
products.description: Deep cleansing facial with extraction, mask, and moisturizing treatment.

products.name: Bridal Package
products.description: Complete bridal styling including trial, hair, makeup, and touch-up kit.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real reviews from our valued clients

items.text: Sarah transformed my hair completely! The color correction was amazing and I get compliments everywhere I go.
items.author: Jessica Martinez

items.text: The bridal package was worth every penny. I felt absolutely beautiful on my wedding day and the photos are stunning.
items.author: Amanda Thompson

items.text: Best salon experience ever! The atmosphere is so relaxing and the staff is incredibly professional and friendly.
items.author: Maria Rodriguez

items.text: I've been coming here for 3 years and they never disappoint. The gel manicures last forever and look perfect.
items.author: Lisa Chen
